SCNP.JK.long_name: PT Selaras Citra Nusantara Perkasa Tbk
SCNP.JK.summary: PT Selaras Citra Nusantar Perkasa Tbk produces and sells household appliance products and medical equipment in Indonesia. It offers blenders, electric irons, gas stoves, electric fans, and air purifiers. The company is based in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Selaras Citra Nusantar Perkasa Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Sena Dwimakmur.
